snippet: Cruzeiro's Marcelo Moreno scored with a sensational scissor kick in the 3-3 draw with Fluminense on Sunday to take his personal tally of the season to 10 and ensure his side finished the first half well clear at the top of Brazil's Serie A....

headline.print_headline: Cruzeiro Top at Halfway Stage but Goals Hard to Come By
headline.main: Cruzeiro Top at Halfway Stage but Goals Hard to Come By

lead_paragraph: Cruzeiro's Marcelo Moreno scored with a sensational scissor kick in the 3-3 draw with Fluminense on Sunday to take his personal tally of the season to 10 and ensure his side finished the first half well clear at the top of Brazil's Serie A.
